nodes.text: The Trade Spine League was an organization that consisted of both smugglers and freelance mercenaries who valued having independence and personal freedom. It operated out of the Anoat sector as both a union and a privateer network. Trade Spine Leaguers were known for their skill at tinkering ship engines, and were impressed by pilots capable of outflying them.

The League was led by Shortpaw, a seemingly unassuming Chadra-Fan who posed as a mere junk dealer. His associates Onn Iria, Ndaya, and Leeka Pali, advised his operations. Although not full-fledged members of the League, gangsters like "Happy" Dapp contributed to making the organization stronger.
